docs.title: What is an article
docs.text: An article is a type of item, not a specific physical one. It can be something like raw materials or equipment. For example, citric acid is an article, but a specific batch of citric acid is called a product.

docs.title: Create articles example input
docs.text:

docs.title: What is a product
docs.text: A product is an individual item, which can be anything from raw materials to finished goods or consumables, like a dispense tip. It can also be based on an article and inherit its attributes.
